channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ford has an AI assistant and new hands-free BlueCruise tech on the way
item.description: Ford says the new generation of BlueCruise will be 30% cheaper to build than the current technology.

item.title: Google and Character.AI negotiate first major settlements in teen chatbot death cases
item.description: The settlements are among the first tied to lawsuits accusing AI companies of harming users.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase becomes the new issuer of the Apple Card
item.description: Apple expects the transition to take 24 months

item.title: Waymo is rebranding its Zeekr robotaxi
Election Deniers Think the Venezuela Attack Is All About 2020
item.description: Conspiracy theorists claim the capture of Venezuelan president Nicolás Maduro is proof that the Venezuelan government rigged the 2020 election in Joe ...

item.title: Discord’s IPO could happen in March
item.description: Discord reportedly filed confidential IPO paperwork and has pinned its hopes on a debut in March.

item.title: Lux Capital lands $1.5B for its largest fund ever
item.description: The 25-year-old firm is an early investor in Anduril, Applied Intuition, and Runway AI.

item.title: AMC previews its new show, ‘The Audacity,’ focused on Silicon Valley
item.description: As one of the show's actors, Billy Magnussen, noted, "Silicon Valley is one of those times in our modern era which is defining humanity. And what bett...

item.title: Discord and Mercor investor Niko Bonatsos departs General Catalyst, plans new VC firm
item.description: Bonatsos spent 15 years at GC, and until last year led the firm's seed investing strategy.

item.title: What’s Going on With Smart Rings?
item.description: Ultrahuman smart rings currently can’t be sold in the US. We caught up with the company’s chief business officer to discuss what’s next for ring-based...
